recipe_name: Goats' cheese wrapped in parma ham with herb salad
author: Tony Tobin
method: Lay the slices of parma ham on a board so that they overlap slightly and place the cheese in the centre. Fold the parma ham around the cheese to enclose it completely. Heat the oil in a small frying pan and fry the parcel for 2-3 minutes on all sides, or until crisp and golden-brown all over. To serve, place the herbs in the centre of a serving plate and top with the cheese parcel.
ingredients: 3 slices parma ham,  1 thick slice goats' cheese,  Â½ tbsp olive oil,  handful fresh coriander, chervil and flatleaf parsley, leaves only, to serve
